definition: to handle/to deal with/to cope/to get by with
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
surname Fu
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: And how would you deal with this brigand?
sentences.chinese: 那你要怎么对付这个土匪呢？

sentences.english: With the iron fist against the puma vocalist, failed to win.
sentences.chinese: 铁彪用残拳对付紫麟，却未能取胜。

sentences.english: That's for mechanical harvesting-the grape growers'way of beating the unions.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了便于机械收割，是葡萄园主对付工会的办法。

sentences.english: I could only imagine what he intended to do to me.
sentences.chinese: 由此，我完全可以想象到，他将如何对付我。

sentences.english: And how do you deal with lip gloss that can't hold still?
sentences.chinese: 还有，怎么对付那些喝点水就掉的液体唇彩？

sentences.english: Some measures are taken to prevent the reckless drive.
sentences.chinese: 采取一些措施对付卤莽驾驶。

sentences.english: Tanks were sent in agai t unarmed students.
sentences.chinese: 出动坦克车对付手无寸铁的学生。

sentences.english: Frank consults his niece, Ann, about how to handle an insect invasion.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克向他的侄女安请教如何对付昆虫的侵害。

sentences.english: Even women have got in on the act and are now using it as a way to dump us!
sentences.chinese: 甚至女人也学到了这一招用来对付男人。

sentences.english: If yod don't have the right tool for the job, we'll have to make do without it.
sentences.chinese: 假如你没有干这活的适当工具，咱们只得对付着干。

sentences.english: Somebody gonna do something about the gophers.
sentences.chinese: 总得有人想法子对付地鼠。

sentences.english: Oncologists must try to outsmart tumors that have already begun to metastasize.
sentences.chinese: 癌病医生们必须采取更有效的办法来对付肿瘤的转移。

sentences.english: Omor himself is a pretty straight forward fight .
sentences.chinese: 对付奥莫自己是个相当直接战斗。

sentences.english: What we call for [is] all the sectors to work with us in dealing with the corruption.
sentences.chinese: 我们呼吁的是让所有部门和我们一起来对付腐败问题。

sentences.english: It is a very different virus that we're dealing with.
sentences.chinese: 它和我们已往所对付的病毒都不大一样。

sentences.english: Mary can get by with her old coat this winter.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽可以用她的旧大衣对付这个冬天。

definition: to get rid of
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to deal with/to cope
to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
to withstand/to resist/to stand off/antagonism/confrontation
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to confront/to face the enemy
to eliminate
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to control/to curb/to restrict/to impede/to pin down (enemy troops)
defense/to defend
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to hold up/to hinder/to stall
to defend oneself/self-defense/self-preservation
to kill
to fit one into the other/to bring two things into contact
